package.describe: NPM module name to generated, typically with namespace structure (e.g. @intercom/app

version.describe: version to be written to the generated package.json (e.g. 1.0.1

app.describe: name of the client application (e.g. https://{hosts}/apps{appName}

port.describe: port number used to host the app in webpack-dev-server for local development (e.g. 3007)
